mapper.select: select s.*, t.id tid, t.name tname from (select * from store where type = #{type}) s join type t on s.type = t.id

select * from( select s.*, m.c from STORE s left join (select store, count(*) c from menu where name like '%' || #{search} || '%' group by store) m on s.no = m.store where (s.name like '%' || #{search} || '%') )
select * from store where id=#{id} and password=#{password}
